title: Santa Fe National Historic Trail: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved         NPS Centennial - 2016 is the 100th anniversary of the National Park Service. Join our celebrations!   Partners -  Check out how we partner with tribes, individuals, organizations, and federal, local, and state agencies to manage the trail and provide excellent experiences for visitors.   Work With Us - Find out what paid or volunteer opportunities exist.   Planning -  Get information about trail planning efforts.   Support Your Park -  Be involved in the protection and experiences that the trail offers.
